龣字的基本解释

龣
jiǎo
古同“角”（ａ．古代军中用的一种乐器。ｂ．古代五音之一。）

龣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jué］
［《廣韻》古岳切，入覺，見。］
［《廣韻》盧谷切，入屋，來。］
五音之一。与“角”同。

龣字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【龠字部】　龣； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页1538第30
【廣韻】古岳切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】訖岳切，?音覺。【玉篇】樂器之聲，東方音也。今作角。【魏書·江式傳】宮商龣徵羽。龣，卽角字。　一曰樂器。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?盧谷切，音祿。義同。　或从鹿作?。

龣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体
龣字的起名意思

暂无。

Sho
Basic explanation of words
Sho
jiǎo
Ancient Tong "horn" (a. A musical instrument used in the ancient military. b. One of the ancient five tones.)
Sho
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jué］
["Guangyun" Gu Yue cuts, enters consciousness, see. ]
["Guangyun" Lu Guqi, enter the house, come. ]
One of the five tones. Same as "horn".
Sho
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Ji 2] [Department of Characters] 　龣; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 1538 30
[Guang Yun] Gu Yue cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Fu Yue cut, sound perception. [Jade articles] The sound of musical instruments, the eastern sound is also. This is a corner. [Wei Shu·Jiang Shi Biography] Gong Shanglu Zhengyu.龣，卽角字.　One is a musical instrument.　[Guangyun] [Jiyun]? Lu Guqie, Yinlu. The same meaning.　Or from the deer?.
